projects.description: Displays my knowledge of basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random Quote Generator, a program that displays a randomly selected quote on a 5 second interval

I created a browser-based, word guessing game: Phrase Hunter. I used JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard. Can they guess the phrase before they run out of attempts?

Full Stack JavaScript developers create forms to collect information from users for nearly every website and application they build. I created an interactive form using my JS your skills to enhance a form so that it is engaging, interactive, and easy to use.

Many sites — Twitter, Facebook, IMDB, and Wikipedia to name a few — offer a vast sea of data that you can access and display on your own web pages. Using JavaScript, I created an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API (Application Programming Interface).
